title: Landing page renders and primary navigation works from root route
description: Verifies the root landing page loads and primary CTA/navigation links are visible and functional.

title: Browse equipment listings and open an equipment details page
description: Verifies a user can browse the equipment marketplace and open an item details page from a listing card.

steps.description: Verify element "equipment listing card" is visible
Click on the first equipment card

title: Search for a tractor and narrow results using category and availability filters
description: Verifies search and filters update the visible equipment results for a common query.

steps.description: Select "Tractor" from the equipment category filter dropdown
Select an availability duration option from the availability filter dropdown
Verify element "equipment listing card" is visible

title: No-results state for unsupported search query
description: Verifies the marketplace shows a clear no-results state and suggestions when a search yields zero matches.

title: Login and complete booking from equipment detail page (happy path)
description: Verifies a user can authenticate and complete an equipment booking, then see booking confirmation details.

steps.description: Click on the first equipment card
Select a start date in the rental start date field
Select an end date in the rental end date field

title: Book equipment by selecting location via in-page state and city filters (static route coverage)
description: Verifies location filtering works via state and city selectors on the equipment page and user can reach details and initiate booking.

steps.description: Select a state from the location (state) dropdown
Select a city from the location (city) dropdown
Verify element "equipment listing card" is visible
Click on the first equipment card

title: Booking blocked when selected rental dates conflict with availability
description: Verifies the UI prevents booking for unavailable dates and displays an appropriate unavailability message and guidance.

steps.description: Click on the first equipment card
Select rental dates shown as unavailable/blocked in the date picker

title: Equipment details page shows gallery and provider information
description: Verifies a user can view key equipment details including photos and provider info from an item detail page.

steps.description: Click on the first equipment card

title: Browse labour listings and view a labourer profile from /labour
description: Verifies a user can open the labour marketplace, browse listings, and open a labourer profile details view.

steps.description: Click on the first visible labourer profile card

title: Search by skill from /labour and open a matching labourer profile
description: Verifies skill search narrows results and a user can open a profile from the filtered list.

steps.description: Click on a labourer profile card that appears in the results

title: Apply filters by location and hourly rate on /labour
description: Verifies filters for location and hourly rate can be applied and filtered results are displayed.

steps.description: Select a visible option from the "Location" dropdown
Select a visible option from the "Hourly rate" dropdown

title: Enter hours exceeding availability shows validation error
description: Verifies the booking form prevents requesting hours beyond the labourer’s availability and shows a visible validation message.

steps.description: Click on "Labour" in the main navigation
Click on the first visible labourer profile card
Type a value larger than the visible available hours into the "Required hours" field

title: No matching results for a skill filter shows no-results messaging and suggestions
description: Verifies the UI communicates when no labourers match filters and shows alternative suggestions.

title: Logged-in user completes a labour booking and sees confirmation
description: Verifies an authenticated user can fill booking details, confirm hiring, and see a visible confirmation with contact details.

steps.description: Click on "Labour" in the main navigation
Click on the first visible labourer profile card
Select a visible option from the "Date" control
Type "Need help with harvesting work; please bring necessary gear." into the "Work requirements" field

title: Open a state-specific labour listing and view a profile (static-route coverage)
description: Verifies users can access a state listing entry point and open a labourer profile from that listing page.

steps.description: Select a visible option from the "Location" dropdown that includes a state name
Click on "View in state" if visible
Click on the first visible labourer profile card

title: Renter login redirects to renter dashboard and renter widgets are visible
description: Verifies a renter can log in and is redirected to the renter dashboard where key renter-specific sections are shown.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button

title: Renter dashboard quick action navigates to Equipment browse page
description: Verifies a renter can use a dashboard quick action card to reach the equipment browsing page.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click the quick action card or button labeled "Browse equipment" or "Search equipment"

title: Renter dashboard quick action navigates to Renter Bookings page
description: Verifies a renter can use a dashboard quick action card to navigate to the renter bookings list.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click the quick action card or button labeled "My bookings" or "View bookings"

title: Provider login redirects to provider dashboard and provider widgets are visible
description: Verifies a provider can log in and is redirected to the provider dashboard with provider-specific summaries.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button

title: Provider dashboard quick action navigates to Provider Equipment management
description: Verifies a provider can use a dashboard quick action to reach equipment management.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click the quick action card or button labeled "Manage equipment" or "My equipment"

title: Admin login redirects to Admin home and can open Admin Analytics
description: Verifies an admin is redirected to the admin area after login and can access platform analytics.

steps.description: Click the "Sign in" or "Log in" button
Click the navigation item or link labeled "Analytics"

title: Open messages inbox and verify conversation list details are visible
description: Verifies an authenticated user can reach the messaging inbox and see a conversation list with last message and timestamp.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation/menu

title: Open a conversation thread from inbox and verify history is shown
description: Verifies a user can open an existing conversation from the inbox and see the thread history.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation/menu
Click on the first conversation in the conversation list

title: Send a message in an existing thread and verify it appears
description: Verifies a user can type and send a message and see it appear in the conversation thread.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation/menu
Click on the first conversation in the conversation list
Type "Hello from UI test" into the message input field
Verify text "Hello from UI test" is visible

title: Verify delivered/read receipt indicator is shown for a sent message
description: Verifies the UI shows a delivered/read receipt (ticks/status) for a message after it is sent.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation/menu
Click on the first conversation in the conversation list
Type "Receipt check message" into the message input field
Verify element "Message delivery/read status (ticks)" is visible

title: Use a notification to open a conversation and verify the new message is visible
description: Verifies clicking an in-app message notification takes the user to the correct conversation and the new message is visible/highlighted.

steps.description: Click on "Notifications" in the main navigation/menu
Click on the most recent notification that indicates a new message

title: Messages inbox loads and allows scrolling to view older conversations
description: Verifies the conversation list supports scrolling and remains usable when viewing older conversations.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation/menu
Scroll to the bottom of the conversation list

title: Conversation thread shows timestamp context for messages
description: Verifies message timestamps (or time separators) are visible in the conversation thread UI.

steps.description: Click on "Messages" in the main navigation/menu
Click on the first conversation in the conversation list

title: View equipment listing reviews and rating summary
description: Verifies a user can open an equipment listing and see the average rating and individual reviews.

steps.description: Click on the first equipment listing card in the results

title: Login and submit a review from Renter Reviews after booking completion prompt
description: Verifies an authenticated renter can submit a star rating and written review and then see it posted.

steps.description: Click on "Reviews" in the renter navigation/menu
Click on the first "Leave a review" or "Write review" button in the list
Type "Good condition and smooth experience." into the review text field
Verify text "Your review has been submitted" is visible

title: Filter reviews by 4–5 stars on a labour listings page
description: Verifies a user can filter visible reviews by high ratings and read review details (text, date, reviewer).

steps.description: Click on the first labour listing card in the results
Select "4 stars & up" from the rating filter dropdown

title: Prevent submitting a review before booking completion
description: Verifies the app blocks unverified review submission and shows a visible error message.

steps.description: Click on "Reviews" in the renter navigation/menu
Click on "Write review" for an item marked as not completed or not eligible (if present)
Verify text "You can only review after booking completion" is visible

title: Validation: submitting a review with empty text shows an error
description: Verifies required review text validation triggers and prevents submission when the text is empty.

steps.description: Click on "Reviews" in the renter navigation/menu
Click on the first "Leave a review" or "Write review" button in the list
Click on the review text field
Verify text "Review text is required" is visible

title: Renter views bookings list and opens a booking details page
description: Verifies a renter can log in, open the bookings list, and view a booking details page with key information visible.

steps.description: Click on the first booking in the bookings list

title: Renter filters bookings by status (Upcoming, Active, Completed, Cancelled)
description: Verifies a renter can switch booking status tabs/filters and see the UI update for each status view.

title: Provider accepts an incoming equipment booking request
description: Verifies a provider can accept a pending booking request and sees a confirmation/status change in the UI.

steps.description: Click on an incoming booking request

title: Provider rejects an incoming equipment booking request
description: Verifies a provider can reject a pending booking request and sees the updated status in the UI.

steps.description: Click on an incoming booking request

title: Renter cancels an existing booking with a cancellation reason
description: Verifies a renter can cancel a booking by selecting a reason and confirming, and the booking shows as cancelled.

steps.description: Click on the first booking in the bookings list
Select "Change of plans" from the cancellation reason dropdown

title: Renter requests booking modification (date or quantity change)
description: Verifies a renter can submit a booking modification request and sees confirmation in the booking timeline or status area.

steps.description: Click on the first booking in the bookings list
Type "Please change the booking dates" into the modification notes field

title: Provider marks a booking as complete after rental period
description: Verifies a provider can mark a booking complete and sees the completed status reflected in the UI.

title: Checkout/payment failure during booking shows an error and retry guidance
description: Verifies that when a booking checkout fails, the UI shows a clear payment failure message and a retry/contact support prompt.

steps.description: Click on "Equipment" in the main navigation
Click on the first equipment listing

title: Provider sees conflict error when trying to accept a booking already accepted elsewhere
description: Verifies the provider is informed of an acceptance conflict and the booking does not show as accepted for this provider.

steps.description: Click on a booking that appears pending

title: Equipment Provider onboarding completes and redirects to Provider Dashboard
description: Verifies a logged-in user can complete onboarding by selecting Equipment Provider, entering required business details, and finishing onboarding with a redirect to the provider dashboard.

title: Equipment Provider onboarding: submit business details and finish onboarding
description: Verifies the provider onboarding page accepts valid business details and completes onboarding to the provider dashboard.

title: Labour Provider onboarding: required field validation when hourly rate is missing
description: Verifies the labour onboarding form blocks completion and shows a visible validation error when required fields are missing.

title: Onboarding page displays initial profile fields and allows progressing after completing them
description: Verifies the onboarding start page contains initial profile fields and the user can proceed after filling them in.

title: Notification badge opens Notification Center and booking notification routes to booking details
description: Verifies the unread notification badge is visible after login, opens the Notification Center, shows categorized notifications, and a booking notification click routes to booking details.

title: Notification Center displays categorized sections (Bookings, Messages, System)
description: Verifies the Notification Center loads and shows the main notification categories for a logged-in user.

title: Mark all notifications as read clears or reduces unread indicator
description: Verifies that using "Mark all as read" updates the visible unread state in the Notification Center.

steps.description: Click the "Mark all as read" button
Verify text "All caught up" is visible

title: Mark a single notification as read updates its read state
description: Verifies that marking one notification as read changes its visible read/unread indicator.

steps.description: Click the first notification in the list to open its actions
Verify text "Read" is visible on the same notification item

title: Update notification preferences: toggle Email and SMS and save
description: Verifies a user can change Email and SMS notification preferences and sees confirmation with persisted state.

title: Saving notification preferences shows confirmation and reflects updated state
description: Verifies saving preferences displays a success message and the toggles remain in the updated state after save.

steps.description: Verify element "Email notifications" toggle is visible

title: Set Quiet Hours and save
description: Verifies a user can set quiet hours in notification preferences and save successfully.

steps.description: Select a start time from the "Quiet hours start" dropdown
Select an end time from the "Quiet hours end" dropdown

title: Cancellation notification routes to booking details and shows cancelled status (if present)
description: Verifies that clicking a booking cancellation notification navigates to booking details and the booking status is shown as cancelled when such a notification exists.

steps.description: Click a notification labeled with text "Cancelled"

title: Create and publish a new equipment listing from Provider Equipment
description: Verifies a provider can add and publish a new equipment listing and then see it in their provider equipment list.

title: Save a new equipment listing with missing required fields shows validation errors
description: Verifies the new equipment flow blocks publishing when required fields are missing and shows visible validation feedback.

title: Edit an existing equipment listing and save changes
description: Verifies a provider can open an equipment item, edit details, save, and see the updated values reflected on return to the equipment list or details view.

steps.description: Click the first equipment item in the list

title: Edit equipment details: cancel/leave without saving does not persist changes
description: Verifies unsaved edits are not applied when the provider exits the edit view without saving.

steps.description: Click the first equipment item in the list
Verify element "Equipment details form" is visible

title: Create a labour offering from Provider Labour Create page
description: Verifies a provider can create a labour offering and see it listed under Provider Labour.

title: Labour offering creation with invalid rate/availability shows validation
description: Verifies labour offering creation prevents submission when required fields are invalid and displays visible validation feedback.

title: View Provider Earnings breakdown and open a transaction details view
description: Verifies a provider can view earnings breakdown and open a specific transaction for details.

steps.description: Click the first transaction entry in the earnings list

title: Renter role cannot access Provider Equipment (403 Forbidden)
description: Verifies a user authenticated as renter is blocked from provider equipment pages and sees the forbidden error page.
